channel.title: ZScape602(Bot)
channel.description:
Yeah, there's a server on the server status, that has a botnet inside of it, the server's name is something like,
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=zscape602.no-ip.info]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=zscape602.no-ip.info[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php/bertscape.dynalias.org?server=zscape602.no-ip.info]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php/bertscape.dynalias.org?server=zscape602.no-ip.info[/url]
So, be weary of this fucktard that doesn't even know how to crypt his bot, it makes me wonder how many bots he has on his computer trying to download his little bot client. Besides, give him some credit, he only posted his IP up for all to see, right? ;)
Some pictures that made me laugh a bit:
[URL=http://img200.imageshack.us/i/l2crypt.png/][IMG]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/9531/l2crypt.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: ZScape602(Bot)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I have removed and banned the server from the server status page. Please contact a moderator or administrator through PM next time, don’t post a topic about it.

Read full topic

Yeah, there’s a server on the server status, that has a botnet inside of it, the server’s name is something like,

Besides, give him some credit, he only posted his IP up for all to see, right?
